name: new Tampa
description:
The digital destination is a hub for the bold, innovative and fast-growing community of indie game developers.
"This is fresh, experimental, and fun," said Outhouse Head of Interactive Communications, Eric L'Arbois. "We're looking forward to seeing what new games we can make there." We're looking for creative minds with passion, creativity, and a bit of good old-fashioned luck. Because games will always surprise us… Pretty kids, adult gaming fans, veterans of indie development, and AAA end users are all welcome. You can create a game in the form of a digital download and show off it to the world by tweeting @gameroom. You can also talk with other developers and the creators of the games you make by asking questions on our Developer forum. For more information about our vibrant, independent dev scene, please check out the game room's website: http://www.gameroom.com/
